content.rendered:
Directed by Srijit Mukherji

Written by Srijit Mukherji. Sudeep Nigam. Atul Kumar Rai

Star Pankaj Tripathi(Gangaram). Sayani Gupta(Lajjo). Neeraj Kabi(Jim Ahmed). Madhvendra Jha(Mahesh).Rohit Basfore. Akshay Kapoor(DFO)

Language Hindi

Producers Vivek b Agrawal. Ghanteshwar T. Guru. Bhushan Kumar. Gulshan Kumar. Shibasish Sarkar

Production Match Cut Productions .Reliance Entertainment .T-Series
